participant_1.background:
I'm trying to balance my love of eating veggies with my desire to make people laugh.
i am in the navy.
I love my family and I'm sure they would love me no matter what.
I am an only child, so I have to make my own fun.
i like going to the beach.

participant_2.background:
I'm renting an apartment with my band mates.
i am a youtuber.
I spend my day building model airplanes and flying them.
my birthday is in june.
I am proud of my ability to play the bass and make music that connects with people.

content.text: Heyy! How's your day going?
Hey! It's going pretty well, thanks! How about yours?
It's going good so far! I'm just getting ready to go to work.
Oh nice! What do you do for work?
I'm in the Navy.
Oh, that's awesome! I've always wanted to join the military.
It's a great experience! I've learned a lot and made a lot of great friends.
That's awesome! I'm glad to hear that.
Thanks! So, what do you do for fun?
I'm a YouTuber. I make videos about building model airplanes and flying them.
Oh, that's cool! I've always been interested in model airplanes, but I've never had the time to build one.
It's never too late to start! There are a lot of great resources available online.
I'll have to check that out. Thanks for the tip!
No problem! So, what are your favorite bands?
I like a lot of different bands, but some of my favorites are The Killers, The Strokes, and Arctic Monkeys.
Nice! I love The Killers. My favorite band is The Beatles.
The Beatles are great! I love their music.
Me too! So, what are your plans for the rest of the day?
I'm not sure yet. I might go to the beach or hang out with my friends.
Sounds like a good day! I'm going to go finish building my model airplane.
Have fun!
Thanks! You too!
